author: Asia Grace
title: I get free Starbucks coffee every time with this easy hack
description: Here’s a hot tip on getting cold sips — completely free of charge. Starbucks lovers will soon be rejoicing in the streets with an on-the-house cold brew in their hands thanks to a trending trick that allows folks to score a free cold brew each time they patronize the famed café.  “This is my favorite...

author: Tribune News Service
title: How Chicago Cubs’ Justin Steele and his fiancee, Libby, are dealing with her debilitating illness during a breakout season
description: Libby Murphy figured the constant extreme exhaustion she experienced was part of being a new mom. Spring training was underway, about seven months after the birth of her son, Beau, who shares a July birthday with his dad and Murphy’ s fiance, Chicago Cubs left-hander Justin Steele. On a breezy late August day at a coffee shop near the Chicago home where she and Steele...

author: Madison Adams
title: Bear raids North Naples family’s garage, helps itself to ice cream
description: A black bear walked inside a North Naples family's garage, opened their freezer and helped himself to a pint of coffee-flavored ice cream with boba pieces in it.The post Bear raids North Naples family’s garage, helps itself to ice cream appeared first on ABC7 Southwest Florida.

author: Andrew Morrisey
title: Best coffee maker deals: Cuisinart, Ninja, Mr. Coffee starting at $25
description: Hot coffee tastes especially good in every season, so we gathered the best deals for coffee and espresso makers.

author: Liam Smillie
title: ‘Sexy Coffee’ café set to open next to Glasgow Central Station this weekend
description: The ‘new-look’ coffee concept next to Glasgow Central will offer cocktails, coffee, and café food from 7am until midnight when it opens this Sunday, September 17

author: WAM
title: World of Coffee Dubai 2024 highlights promising prospects for development and expansion of coffee industry in UAE
description: DXB Live, the integrated event management and experiential agency of the Dubai World Trade Centre, continues the preparations for the 3rd edition of the World of Coffee exhibition, which will be held from 21st to 23rd January 2024.With expectations that the coffee market in the UAE will grow at an annual rate of 8.4 per cent between 2023 and 2029, and by about 7.5 per cent annually in the Middle East and Africa between 2022 and 2027, the exhibition is witnessing a wide regional and global interest from industry leaders, experts and specialists.As per a report by Statista, coffee markets in...

author: BusinessWorld
title: Coffee firms won’t be ready to comply with EU deforestation law – report
description: LONDON – Most global coffee firms will not be ready to comply with the European Union’s new law preventing imports of commodities linked to deforestation, and small farmers may suffer as a consequence, a major coffee sector report has found. The EU’s landmark law, which comes into effect at end-2024, requires importers of commodities like […]

author: Tamara Markard
title: Charley & Co. Market expands footprint to neighboring coffee shop
description: Co-owners Tammy Kidwell and Lisa Shelley bought the coffee shop in January and have slowly been making the transition from neighbors to owners.
